tab_connections.Name: editorial / selection
tab_connections.Description: Return a list of albums selected every week by the Deezer Team.
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type album

tab_connections.Name: editorial / charts
tab_connections.Description: This method returns four lists : Top track, Top album, Top artist and Top playlist.
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type trackA list of object of type albumA list of object of type artistA list of object of type playlist

tab_connections.Name: editorial / releases
tab_connections.Description: This method returns the new releases per genre for the current country
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type album
